desc: Color Guard & Winter Guard Jewelry and Gifts for your favorite Guardie, Guard Coach, Guard Captain or Guard Mom. Charms & necklaces for Drill Teams and Flag Teams too. USA made, fast & free shipping and a lifetime warranty on all Color Guard Jewelry. Family of master jewelers trusted by the color guard for over 30 yrs

layout.text: ColorGuardGifts.com is a 4th generation family owned business located in the beautiful Smoky Mountains
